title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 2013 Lealana 0.25BTC silver 1/2oz #9949 "1BTCsc75", ANACS MS68https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/1BTCsc75XNEiv233AZcVMDpZaM9X4faf4pThis version of the 0.25BTC coin is quite rare as of the 1200 minted, about 290 used black first bits and were serialized.Of these 290, around ONLY 25 were assembled using the Gold Hologram which was normally used on the 0.1BTC brass and 1BTC silversSTARTING BID: 0.250BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: JUNE 28th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
